home.We all want to learn the art of cooking: We all want to learn the art of cooking for different reasons ( showing love through a delicious home-cooked meal for all our loved ones!!, Learning as a relaxing hobby alongside the work we love!!, Also our passion for cooking can be our own source of income and that's great if your passion is your job. and many different and special reasons each of us has his own reason .... That's why we present to you this diploma prepared by world cooking experts you can watch the description and also instead of stopping the video to write the ingredients or take a screenshot of it it is now written for you (the ingredients and the method) so let's start this professional adventure. Good luck to all )....

enroll.The duration of the diploma is two month: The duration of the diploma is two months from the date of the diploma start and not from the date of reservation, as the diploma dates are fixed and do not change from one person to another according to the reservation date
enroll.Upon reservation, the examinee will be n: Upon reservation, the examinee will be notified of the exam date, provided that the exam is not connected to the Internet
enroll.The examinee must obtain 80% of the exam: The examinee must obtain 80% of the exam mark and the examinee will receive an accredited certificate
enroll.This diploma is intended for mothers and: This diploma is intended for mothers and fathers, working women, or students who do not have enough time to attend
enroll.The Student is not entitled To a Refund: The Student is not entitled To a Refund Of Diploma Amount After Booking
